title: Best Games Store
description: A sleek, responsive web application built with Angular and Angular Material, designed to help gamers explore and discover their next favorite title from a database of over 500,000 games. Features a modern dark theme for an immersive feel.
features: Advanced Search & Filtering – Quickly find games by title or preference
Dynamic Game Cards – Displaying cover art, platforms, and quick info at a glance
Detailed Game Pages – Includes release dates, supported platforms, publishers, official links, descriptions, and Metacritic scores
Media-Rich Experience – Tabs for additional content such as screenshots and details
Optimized Performance – Smooth navigation and fast data loading
keyContribution: Developed the entire front-end using Angular, integrated with a gaming API for real-time data, and optimized UI/UX for clarity and engagement.

title: League of Legends Champion Directory
tagline: A fan-made, interactive champion database for League of Legends.
description: A sleek, single-page application that serves as a comprehensive directory for League of Legends champions. The platform provides a rich, data-driven experience with detailed statistics, robust search functionality, and a user-friendly interface. The dark theme and clean layout are designed to offer an immersive browsing experience.
features: Dynamic Champion Cards – Browse a grid of champions with key information like name and HP
Advanced Search & Filtering – Quickly find champions by name and sort them by different attributes
Detailed Statistics Table – View in-depth stats for favorited champions, including Armor, Attack Damage, and Spell Block
Watchlist Functionality – Add champions to a personal list for quick access and detailed comparison
Responsive Design – The interface is optimized for both desktop and mobile viewing
techStack: React (or a similar modern front-end framework)
keyContribution: Developed the front-end user interface and state management, integrated with a public League of Legends API to fetch champion data, and implemented search, sorting, and watchlist functionality.

title: SkillScore
tagline: An interactive, multi-topic quiz platform for developers.
description: A responsive web application designed to help users test and improve their knowledge across various technology stacks. The platform features a clean user interface and offers a customizable quiz experience with timed questions and instant scoring.
features: Dynamic Quiz Topics – Select from HTML, JavaScript, SQL, DevOps, and more
Customizable Quiz Settings – Set your preferred difficulty level and number of questions
Timed Question System – Each question is timed to encourage quick thinking
Progressive Web Interface – Allows users to resume a quiz after an unexpected browser or tab closure
Instant Feedback and Scoring – Receive an immediate score and performance summary upon completion
keyContribution: Developed the user interface and core quiz logic, implemented dynamic topic and question loading, and integrated local storage for session management and quiz resumption.
